Name: 愛神餐館MAX
About the game: Love, restaurant, and RPG adventure all in one, the origin of the 'Cupid Bistro!!' series is here! As the main protagonist Rato Coriander, a year 2 student of the Royal College of Saint Cinnamon, the highest education institute for cooking in the Kingdom, you need to run a bistro in Fennel as part of your final year assignment. In one year's time, you will research for more cuisines and get to know different people / girls here.... you are the one to decide all different endings! Game System Cupid Bistro!! MAX is a game you develop your relationship with the girls by running your restaurant. As Rato, your objective is to get a happy ending in the graduation ceremony 1 year later. The game was composed of 4 main parts, and you can schedule them to your weekly planner. 'Going out': To talk and meet the girls 'Management': Manage your restaurant 'Adventure': To find new recipes and level up your characters 'Research': To master the new recipes you got Features 13 beautiful heroines Multiple endings 13 maximum levels of restaurant RPG dungeon adventure mode
